channel.title: GitHub on Nikita's blog
channel.description: Recent content in GitHub on Nikita's blog

item.title: Using Multiple GitHub Accounts on the Same Login
item.description: If you want to use multiple GitHub accounts, for example, one for your work and one for your hobby projects, you can do so on the same login account. Here’s a step-by-step guide on how to set this up. Step 1: Generate Separate SSH Keys To keep your work and hobby accounts separate, you need to have separate SSH keys for each of them. You can generate these keys using the ssh-keygen tool.
